name: Depth Motion with Foreground/Background
description: Tests depth motion coherence with foreground subject and background activity - validates multi-plane temporal consistency. HARDENED 2025-12-03 for object consistency.

sceneContext.summary: A single cream-colored ceramic coffee mug with latte art sits in sharp focus on a warm wooden counter. The primary focus is this one mug - it never moves, never multiplies, never changes. In the blurred background, a single barista in a black apron pours from one consistent stainless steel pitcher (not a flask, not a coffee pot - always the same single pitcher).
sceneContext.environment: Warm coffee shop interior with wooden counter, steam rising from the single mug, shallow depth of field separating foreground and background

videoContext.motionDescription: The foreground mug remains absolutely still in place - it never moves, never multiplies. Steam rises naturally from the same mug. The barista's motion is smooth and continuous: starts at espresso machine, reaches toward the counter, pours from the SAME stainless steel pitcher into the SAME mug. The pitcher type never changes. No additional cups appear.
videoContext.cameraMotion: Completely static camera locked in place, no camera movement, no zoom, no pan

expectedBehavior.primary: The single foreground mug maintains exact position and appearance throughout. No extra mugs appear.
expectedBehavior.secondary: Background barista moves naturally with one consistent pitcher - no vessel changes (no flask-to-pot transitions)
expectedBehavior.challenges: Maintaining object count (always 1 mug, 1 pitcher), preventing vessel type changes, natural steam motion
